thread.title: Peter Wiseman
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Peter Wiseman

author: Peter Wiseman
title: Peter Wiseman
text: I live in America and have bought stuff from Freeze Pro Shop several times now and they've always shipped quickly and the items have arrived within a week, usually via DHL with tracking. I've never had to pay any import duty as I think if the value is under $600 then you're okay. American customers don't have to pay VAT so you save 20% instantly and thanks to good old Brexit, the exchange rate is so favorable right now that these savings far outweigh any international shipping costs. If you live in the States and know what you want and it's unlikely you'll need to return anything (e.g. clothes) then you can get some great prices buying from here.
